com.controller.entities

Class PowerupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.controller.entities.PowerupController

  • public class PowerupController
extends EntityController
    The controller for the powerup to be spawned, houses all the different powerup types.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerupController(float x, float y, GameLogic gameLogic)
      Adds a Powerup Controller to the world, for the player to pick up.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activates the powerup.
      java.lang.String getPowerupType()
      Returns the type of powerup.
      void powerupType(java.lang.String type)
      Important for GameStage, that needs to know what type of powerup it is so it can display its sprite correctly.
      void update()
      Updates the time, so when a limit is reached, the powerup is destroyed.

      • Methods inherited from class com.controller.entities.EntityController

        getType, getX, getY, isFlaggedForDelete, kill, resurrect, setPosition, setType

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerupController

        public PowerupController(float x,
                         float y,
                         GameLogic gameLogic)
        Adds a Powerup Controller to the world, for the player to pick up.
        Parameters:
        x - X spawn position.
        y - Y spawn position.
        gameLogic - Needed to affect hero or gun on activation.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the time, so when a limit is reached, the powerup is destroyed.

      • powerupType

        Parameters:
        type - Type of powerup.
